input: I need a batch request to fetch lock request details and lock event specifications with filtering.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequestEventSpecifications?$filter=EventCode eq '301000' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequests?$filter=UserStatusCode eq '2' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
